articles.author: Craig Hale
articles.title: Adobe users are furious about the company's terms of service change to help it train AI - TechRadar
articles.description: Customers are unhappy with Adobe… again
articles.content:
Adobe is facing backlash over recent updates to its Terms of Service for the company's generative AI products.
The revised terms, affecting over 20 million global users of Adobe’s Creative Cloud Sui… [+2034 chars]
